name: Gloomy Appartment
description:
You finally found the key, now open the door.

Unravel what lies behind that doorknob.

A new life begins for you, however it has a cost...

How to play :

  • Turn with: <- , ->, right click+move the mouse, a, d,q
  • Turn back quickly: s, x, down arrow
  • Move: w,z
  • Options: esc, back space
  • Run: tab, space
  • Inventory: ctrl
  • Flashlight: shift, middle mouse button
  • Speed Time: t, tab
  • Slow Time: e
  • See AI vision: v
